body_html:
Add READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission in manifest.
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE"/>

Looks like this error is caused by java.io.FileNotFoundException: imagenet_comp_graph_label_strings.txt, but the missing text file exists in Android example. Just giving permission to READ the file solved the issue in my case.
body_text:
Add READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission in manifest.
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE"/>
Looks like this error is caused by java.io.FileNotFoundException: imagenet_comp_graph_label_strings.txt, but the missing text file exists in Android example. Just giving permission to READ the file solved the issue in my case.
body:
Add READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE permission in manifest. 
`<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE"/>`

Looks like this error is caused by `java.io.FileNotFoundException: imagenet_comp_graph_label_strings.txt`, but the missing text file exists in Android example. Just giving permission to READ the file solved the issue in my case.
